full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,PAn CHEN RIN PO CHE'I GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS DANG, SPYAN RAS GZIGS PHYAG BZHI PA'I SGRUB THABS BDE BA CAN GYI SMON LAM BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI MDZOD @004B MER KEN MKHAN PO JA SAG BLA MA BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG ,BSKYED BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN CHOS MDZAD DANG YONGS 'DZIN RJE ZHAL SNGA NAS BLO BZANG DGE LEGS, SNGAGS CHEN ZHAL SNGA NAS BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS DKYIL KHANG ZHAL SNGA NAS BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN, SHANG TSE ZHAL SNGA NAS YE SHES BKRA SHIS, THOS BSAM ZHAL SNGA NAS BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS, DGE BSKOS CHEN MO DRUNG NAM BLO BZANG RIG GROL, TSOGS CHEN DANG BRGYUD PA GRVA TSANG GI LAS TSAN PA, NYER KHOR BA NANG MA LAS CHEN PO SOGS BSKUL BA LTAR, @005A *, ,SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL GYIS CHU MO GLANG LO'I RGYAL ZLA BA'I YAR TSES BCU GSUM LA GZIM CHUNG BKA' GDAMS PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
